summary: In the 1913 US Open, 20-year-old Francis Ouimet played golf against his idol, 1900 US Open champion, Englishman Harry Vardon.
cast: James Paxton|Tom Rack|Armand Laroche|Peter Hurley|Gregory Terlecki|Jonathan Higgins|Matthew Knight|Luke Askew|Amanda Tilson|Elias Koteas|Jamie Merling|Eugenio Esposito|Marnie McPhail|Stephen Dillane|Robin Wilcock|Peter Firth|Michael Sinelnikoff|Shia LaBeouf|Justin Ashforth|Arthur Holden|Len Cariou|Peyton List|Nicolas Wright|Max Kasch|Danette Mackay|Scott Faulconbridge|George Asprey|Stephen Marcus|Joe Jackson|Luke Kirby|Tim Peper|Mike 'Nug' Nahrgang|Dawn Upshaw|James Bradford|Marc James Beauchamp|Michael Weaver|Pierre Boudreau|Josh Flitter|Dennis St John|Terry Reid|Stephen Spreekmeester|Philip Pretten|Patrick Whitebean|Walter Massey|Melissa Carter|Melanie Beaulne|J. title: Juego de honor
